Package FileTransfer

Class FileTransferClient

java.lang.Object
FileTransfer.FileTransferClient
public class FileTransferClient
extends java.lang.Object
File transfer Client with regular Socket. If connection drops, before all 100 256Byte packets are exchanged, the client tries to reconnect and ask for the remaining ones (shouldn't happen in localhost).
